reference.title: cxxTypedefDefinition
reference.shortdesc: Contains child elements providing details of an alias introduced by the C++ keyword typedef.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxTypedefDefinition> element is defined within <cxxTypedefDetail>. The child element <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> is mandatory.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxTypedefDefinition> <cxxTypedefAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxTypedefDerivations> <cxxTypedefDerivation> <cxxTypedefDerivationAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxTypedefBaseTypedef href="typedef_c_base.xml#typedef_c_base">CBase</cxxTypedefBaseTypedef> </cxxTypedefDerivation> </cxxTypedefDerivations> <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/e32base.h"/> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="2812"/> <cxxTypedefDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/e32base.h"/> <cxxTypedefDefinitionFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="2784"/> <cxxTypedefDefinitionFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="2854"/> </cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> </cxxTypedefDefinition>
